keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continuing to win business investment into Reading to deliver more jobs & speaking up for our local businesses in Parliament.
Campaigning for more government infrastructure money, having already won millions for rail and road projects across Reading.
Working to deliver more school places and an outstanding education for our children, having supported new schools to set up

issues.education: Working to deliver more school places and an outstanding education for our children, having supported new schools to set up

images.caption: Alok Sharma - Continuing to deliver for Reading West
